author: scottbw
msg: Implemented StorageEvents for the Widget Preferences object; this now passes two of the three StorageEvent conformance tests (the other fails for a completely different reason).
Note that Events are handled in a non-standard way in IE before version 9 (surprise!) and I haven't been able to test if the workaround actually works.
